name: Wialon Kit

screenshots.caption: To edit the interface and create server and client programs, mobile or web-applications in Wialon Kit, please fill in the form with the information about your company in the control panel
The basic Wialon Kit user interface demo mode aveliable at http://one.wialon.com/

short_description: Wialon Kit is the set of tools allowing to edit the interface and create server and client software for fleet management, logistics and intelligent GPS tracking. Wialon Kit and based on it programs get the access to the telematics data that Wialon Data Center receives from more than 403 types of different GPS/GLONASS devices. Wialon Kit is designed primarily for companies that integrate GPS/GLONASS tracking systems, provide logistics and fleet management services and want to expand the range of services offered by the unique solution created by themselves on basis of Wialon Kit.
summary: Wialon Kit is the platform for the GPS/GLONASS vehicle tracking
